[event]
# Warp to Cave 2
type=event
location=48,17,1,4
activate=on_trigger
hotspot=location
intermap=maps/cave_of_living_bones2.txt,3,38
tooltip=Cave of Living Bones 2

[event]
# Crate of Blasting Powder
type=event
location=6,6,1,1
activate=on_trigger
hotspot=location
mapmod=collision,6,6,0;object,6,6,0
repeat=false
set_status=lb_has_explosive
tooltip=Crate of Blasting Powder

[event]
# Barrel
type=event
location=5,6,1,1
activate=on_trigger
hotspot=location
loot=loot/leveled_high.txt
mapmod=object,5,6,178
repeat=false
soundfx=soundfx/wood_open.ogg
tooltip=Barrel

[event]
# Barrel
type=event
location=3,18,1,1
activate=on_trigger
hotspot=location
loot=loot/leveled_mid.txt
mapmod=object,3,18,178
repeat=false
soundfx=soundfx/wood_open.ogg
tooltip=Barrel

[event]
# Cave wind sound effect
type=event
location=0,0,1,1
activate=on_load
soundfx=soundfx/environment/cave_wind_loop.ogg

[enemy]
# Guard the Explosives
type=enemy
location=5,7,6,17
category=undead
level=6,8
number=5,7

[enemy]
# Various Enemies
type=enemy

number=7,10
